long_description: The GCI Outdoor Slim-Fold Event Chair has a patent-pending design that makes it fold flat into compact spaces when you're traveling to a music festival, campground or tailgate party. With padded armrests and a side table with a built-in beverage holder, the Slim-Fold Event Chair lets you get comfortable and enjoy your day outdoors. When it's time to pack up, simply fold the chair up and carry with the backpack straps to keep your hands free. GCI Outdoor Slim-Fold Event Chair steel frame and polyester fabric support up to 250 lbs.
short_description: The GCI Outdoor Slim-Fold Event Chair has a patent-pending design that makes it fold flat into compact spaces when you're traveling to a music festival, campground or tailgate party.
